meanings.definition: In the final position in a series or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The lastly piece of the puzzle completed the picture.
meanings.sent2: The lastly cookie in the jar was the biggest.
meanings.sent3: The lastly banana in the bunch was wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: The lastly star in the sky shone the brightest.
meanings.sent5: The lastly flower in the garden was the most colorful.

meanings.sent1: She finished her chores lastly before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: Lastly, we reached the top of the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The cat finally caught the mouse lastly.
meanings.sent4: Lastly, the sun set behind the hills.
meanings.sent5: The magician revealed his final trick lastly.
